description.value: Your tongue darts out in search of refreshment. Choose a liquid container of up to light Bulk within reach of your lash, such as a potion or elixir. The container must be held or in the open, not stowed in a pack or bandoleer. If the container is unattended or held by a willing ally, you Interact to drink the contents. If the container is held by an unwilling creature, you must succeed on a check using your unarmed attack modifier or Thievery modifier against the creature's Reflex DC to drink the contents; this adds the attack trait.
